title: inSure DeFi Staking Rewards on Ethereum, BSC, and Polygon
body:
We would like to continue our staking program and reward all LP providers based on the following ideas: 

1. LP Rewards will be available for all the members who stake on Uniswap, PancakeSwap (BSC), and QuickSwap (Polygon)
2. 5% rewards based on the staked SURE amount will be distributed to all LP providers.
3. 0.3% from each transaction will be shared between all the LP providers in the specific liquidity pool. (subject to change to 1% if community members -LP providers choose to enable 1% transaction rewards)

This approach will allow to:

1. Be transparent with all the rewards calculations (SURE staked amount is verifiable on DEXs and blockchain scans)
2. Stabilize the SURE price
3. Ensure growth of the value of the inSure DeFi Ecosystem in the long term.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
